title: If you main mid, make sure your map awareness is on point!
body:
Having christopher columbus as your mid laner is hell.

Also, if you think it's not worth risking a few cs because the fight might be over before you even get there. Think again! You'd be suprised how often you get to that top lane/bottom lane gank in time to clean up a kill. 

You don't have to be TF to roam.
